King Charles strips Andrew of his prince title after his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein caused the royals “immense damage”, says former Times royal correspondent and author of Power and the Palace, Valentine Low.

episodes.title: ‘Hand of Prince William’ likely behind stripping of Prince Andrew’s titles | Nick Serpell
episodes.description:
“What I do detect from all this, very much, is the hand of the Prince of Wales behind this.”

Prince William is “modernising” the Royal Family, as the scandal surrounding the former Prince Andrew is not compatible with that, says former Times Radio Royal commentator, Nick Serpell.

episodes.title: Prince Andrew stripped of all titles and thrown out of Royal Lodge
episodes.description:
"This is the King's definitive and concrete action to show that they are taking this very seriously."

The King went through the Lord Chancellor to strip Andrew of his titles to avoid "wasting parliamentary time" after the situation was "snowballing out of control", says Royal reporter Sarah Hewson.

episodes.title: Prince Andrew will never clear his name | Piers Morgan gives damning assessment of Epstein saga
episodes.description:
"There are many unanswered questions but one fact we know is that Prince Andrew lied to Emily Maitlis."

Prince Andrew won't "ever be able to clear his name" unless he gives evidence under oath, but "I'm not holding my breath", says Broadcaster and journalist, Pier Morgan.

episodes.title: Virginia Giuffre’s allegations against Prince Andrew, explained | The Royals
episodes.description:
Virginia Giuffre's memoir - 'Nobody's Girl' - claims Prince Andrew felt ‘sex with me was his birthright’. He has denied all allegations that he had sex with the then 17 year old, but do the Epstein links again threaten the wider reputation of the monarchy? Andrew has already been stripped of any meaningful official role. He no longer receives public funds, and holds no royal patronages. He has had to relinquish his honorary military titles. But what do the British public think about this ongoing and ever more upsetting saga? 

Recorded live in front of an audience at the Cheltenham Literature Festival on 16th October 2025.

episodes.title: Inside the religious MAGA sect that believes Trump was anointed by God | Times Radio
episodes.description:
“They would do a civil war if they could.”

Times Radio's Jo Crawford travelled to Nebraska to investigate a fringe evangelical sect that believes the US is in the midst of a spiritual war and Donald Trump was anointed by God. 

Times Radio has contacted FlashPoint and Lord of Hosts church for comment and is awaiting their response.
